Trade/Device Name(s): FreeStyle InsuLinx Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FreeStyle InsuLinx Blood Glucose Monitoring System using coulometric biosensor technology for self-monitoring of blood glucose in people with diabetes
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip for self-testing at home by people with diabetes as an aid to monitor diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
